title: Hy Pimpot's Secret Recipe - Reward Set Card 26 of 31
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace "each flora" with up to 5 flora.

Elder's notes: While there are very few situations in Lure of the Valley in which you'd have 6 or more flora in play, this is far more common in some of the flora-heavy sets in Legacy of the Ancestors. You should barely feel this change in Lure of the Valley, but going into Legacy of the Ancestors, it'll have a much larger impact.
